title: Higgs field as a source of tachyons
authors: Jerzy Paczos, Szymon Cedrowski, Krzysztof Turzy\'nski, Andrzej Dragan
abstract:
We investigate the Brout-Englert-Higgs mechanism of spontaneous symmetry
breaking and show that before the symmetry was broken, the interaction of Higgs
fields with massless gauge fields inevitably lead to the production of
tachyons.
